```{r}
#| echo: false

options(scipen = 999)
ManifoldDestiny::wasmconload()
source(paste0(rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file(),"/R/wasmconverting.R"))
source(paste0(rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file(),"/R/wasmnonverting.R"))
apps <- appn1
adat <- apps[[1]]
amet <- apps[[2]]
cogr <- Countinggraphs(apps[[1]])
selo <- seloutput(selreport(apps))
copl <- cogr$polyc[[1]][[1]]
```

### With purge

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
options(digits=2)
ManifoldDestiny::wasmconload()
source(paste0(rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file(),"/R/wasmconverting.R"))
source(paste0(rprojroot::find_rstudio_root_file(),"/R/wasmnonverting.R"))
appn1[[2]]$prg$cnd  <- 1
appn1[[2]]$prg$z  <- 200
apps <- appn1
adat <- apps[[1]]
amet <- apps[[2]]
cogr <- Countinggraphs(apps[[1]])
selo <- seloutput(selreport(apps))
selo[[2]]
copl <- cogr$polyc[[1]][[1]]
```
